transform.tRule:
######################################################################## # Beta Maṣāḥǝft Transliteration # # https://github.com/BetaMasaheft/transliteration/blob/master/translitterator.js # # Initial Editor: Daniel Yacob <yacob@geez.org> # ########################################################################
# MINIMAL FILTER: Amharic-Latin :: [ሀ-፼ⶓ-ⶖ] ; :: NFD (NFC) ;
$ግዕዝ = 'a'; $ካዕብ = 'u'; $ሣልስ = 'i' ; $ራዕብ = 'ā'; $ኃምስ = 'e' ; $ሳድስ = 'ǝ'; $ሳብዕ = 'o'; $ዘመደ_ግዕዝ = 'ʷa'; $ዘመደ_ሣልስ = 'ʷi'; $ዘመደ_ካዕብ = 'ʷǝ'; $ዘመደ_ራዕብ = 'ʷā'; $ዘመደ_ኃምስ = 'ʷe';
$አለፍ = ʾ; $ዐይን = ʿ;
# Us $ግዕዝ this $wordBoundary until bug 2034 is fixed in ICU: # http://bugs.icu-project.org/trac/ticket/2034 $wordBoundary = [^[:L:][:M:][:N:]] ;
######################################################################## # Start of Syllabic Transformations ########################################################################
ሀ → h $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HA ሁ ↔ h $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HU ሂ ↔ h $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HI ሃ → h $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HAA ሄ ↔ h $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HEE ህ}$wordBoundary → h ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HE ህ ↔ h $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HE ሆ ↔ h $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HO ህ ← h ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HE
ለ ↔ l $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LA ሉ ↔ l $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LU ሊ ↔ l $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LI ላ ↔ l $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LAA ሌ ↔ l $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LEE ል}$wordBoundary → l ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LE ል ↔ l $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LE ሎ ↔ l $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LO ሏ ↔ l $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LWA ል ← l ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE LE
ሐ ↔ ḥ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHA ሑ ↔ ḥ $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHU ሒ ↔ ḥ $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHI ሓ → ḥ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHAA ሔ ↔ ḥ $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHEE ሕ}$wordBoundary → ḥ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHE ሕ ↔ ḥ $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHE ሖ ↔ ḥ $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHO ሗ ↔ ḥ $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHWA ሕ ← ḥ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE HHE
መ ↔ m $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MA ሙ ↔ m $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MU ሚ ↔ m $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MI ማ ↔ m $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MAA ሜ ↔ m $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MEE ም}$wordBoundary → m; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ME ም ↔ m $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ME ሞ ↔ m $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MO ሟ ↔ m $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MWA ፙ ↔ my $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE MYA ም ← m ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ME
ሠ ↔ ś $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZA ሡ ↔ ś $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZU ሢ ↔ ś $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZI ሣ ↔ ś $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZAA ሤ ↔ ś $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZEE ሥ}$wordBoundary → ś ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZE ሥ ↔ ś $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZE ሦ ↔ ś $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZO ሧ ↔ ś $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZWA ሥ ← ś ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SZE
ረ ↔ r $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RA ሩ ↔ r $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RU ሪ ↔ r $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RI ራ ↔ r $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RAA ሬ ↔ r $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE REE ር}$wordBoundary → r ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RE ር ↔ r $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RE ሮ ↔ r $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RO ሯ ↔ r $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RWA ፘ ↔ ry $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RYA ር ← r ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE RE
ሰ ↔ s $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SA ሱ ↔ s $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SU ሲ ↔ s $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SI ሳ ↔ s $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SAA ሴ ↔ s $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SEE ስ}$wordBoundary → s ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SE ስ ↔ s $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SE ሶ ↔ s $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SO ሷ ↔ s $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SWA ስ ← s ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE SE

ቀ ↔ q $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QA ቁ ↔ q $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QU ቂ ↔ q $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QI ቃ ↔ q $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QAA ቄ ↔ q $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QEE ቅ}$wordBoundary → q ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QE ቅ ↔ q $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QE ቆ ↔ q $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QO ቈ ↔ q $ዘመደ_ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWA ቍ ↔ q $ዘመደ_ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWE ቋ ↔ q $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWAA ቌ ↔ q $ዘመደ_ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWEE ቊ ↔ q $ዘመደ_ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QWI ቅ ← q ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE QE
በ ↔ b $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BA ቡ ↔ b $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BU ቢ ↔ b $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BI ባ ↔ b $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BAA ቤ ↔ b $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BEE ብ}$wordBoundary → b ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BE ብ ↔ b $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BE ቦ ↔ b $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BO ቧ ↔ b $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BWA ብ ← b ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE BE
ቨ ↔ v $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VA ቩ ↔ v $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VU ቪ ↔ v $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VI ቫ ↔ v $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VAA ቬ ↔ v $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VEE ቭ}$wordBoundary → v ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VE ቭ ↔ v $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VE ቮ ↔ v $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VO ቯ ↔ v $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VWA ቭ ← v ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE VE
ተ ↔ t $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TA ቱ ↔ t $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TU ቲ ↔ t $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TI ታ ↔ t $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TAA ቴ ↔ t $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TEE ት}$wordBoundary → t ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TE ት ↔ t $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE ቶ ↔ t $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TO ቷ ↔ t $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE TWA ት ← t ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE
ጨ ↔ č̣ $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHA ጩ ↔ č̣ $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHU ጪ ↔ č̣ $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHI ጫ ↔ č̣ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHAA ጬ ↔ č̣ $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHEE ጭ}$wordBoundary → č̣ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHE ጭ ↔ č̣ $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHE ጮ ↔ č̣ $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHO ጯ ↔ č̣ $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHWA ጭ ← č̣ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CHE
ቸ ↔ č $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CA ቹ ↔ č $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CU ቺ ↔ č $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CI ቻ ↔ č $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CAA ቼ ↔ č $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CEE ች}$wordBoundary → č ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CE ች ↔ č $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CE ቾ ↔ č $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CO ቿ ↔ č $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CWA ች ← č ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE CE
ኀ → ḫ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XA ኁ ↔ ḫ $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XU ኂ ↔ ḫ $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XI ኃ ↔ ḫ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XAA ኄ ↔ ḫ $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XEE ኅ}$wordBoundary → ḫ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XE ኅ ↔ ḫ $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XE ኆ ↔ ḫ $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XO ኈ ↔ ḫ $ዘመደ_ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWA ኊ ↔ ḫ $ዘመደ_ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWI ኋ ↔ ḫ $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWAA ኌ ↔ ḫ $ዘመደ_ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWEE ኍ ↔ ḫ $ዘመደ_ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XWE ኅ ← ḫ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE XE
ነ ↔ n $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NA ኑ ↔ n $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NU ኒ ↔ n $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NI ና ↔ n $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NAA ኔ ↔ n $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NEE ን}$wordBoundary → n ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NE ን ↔ n $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NE ኖ ↔ n $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NO ኗ ↔ n $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NWA ን ← n ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NE
ኘ ↔ ñ $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYA ኙ ↔ ñ $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYU ኚ ↔ ñ $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYI ኛ ↔ ñ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYAA ኜ ↔ ñ $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYEE ኝ}$wordBoundary → ñ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYE ኝ ↔ ñ $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYE ኞ ↔ ñ $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYO ኟ ↔ ñ $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYWA ኝ ← ñ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE NYE
$wordBoundary{አ ↔ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL A $wordBoundary{ኡ ↔ $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL U $wordBoundary{ኢ ↔ $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL I $wordBoundary{ኣ → $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL AA $wordBoundary{ኤ ↔ $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL EE $wordBoundary{እ ↔ $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL E $wordBoundary{ኦ ↔ $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL O $wordBoundary{ኧ ↔ $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL WA
አ ↔ $አለፍ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL A ኡ ↔ $አለፍ $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL U ኢ ↔ $አለፍ $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL I ኣ → $አለፍ $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL AA ኤ ↔ $አለፍ $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL EE እ ↔ $አለፍ $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL E ኦ ↔ $አለፍ $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL O ኧ ↔ $አለፍ $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE GLOTTAL WA
ከ ↔ k $ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KA ኩ ↔ k $ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KU ኪ ↔ k $ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KI ካ ↔ k $ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KAA ኬ ↔ k $ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KEE ክ}$wordBoundary → k ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KE ክ ↔ k $ሳድስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KE ኮ ↔ k $ሳብዕ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KO ኰ ↔ k $ዘመደ_ግዕዝ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWA ኲ ↔ k $ዘመደ_ሣልስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWI ኳ ↔ k $ዘመደ_ራዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWAA ኴ ↔ k $ዘመደ_ኃምስ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWEE ኵ ↔ k $ዘመደ_ካዕብ ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KWE ክ ← k ; # ETHIOPIC SYLLABLE KE
